58ca773b44b4b.Name: LLP011 List adddresses to select from
58ca773b44b4b.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59dc224eb4f63","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name
FROM (SELECT * FROM llpgcache WHERE {postcode_search_after} != '') tmp
WHERE (
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{postcode_search_after},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))>5
AND postcode != ''

ORDER BY CAST(pao AS SIGNED),sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 300","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

58ca6c233f02c.Name: LLP015 Selected value to fields
58ca6c233f02c.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59dc224eb4f63","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"select a.*
		,if(substring(a.test,1,1)='1',flat_out
									 ,if(substring(a.test,1,1)='2',house_out
																  ,if(substring(a.test,1,1)='3',street_out
																							   ,if(substring(a.test,1,1)='4',town_out,'')))) as textOut1
		,if(substring(a.test,2,1)='2',house_out
									 ,if(substring(a.test,2,1)='3',street_out
																  ,if(substring(a.test,2,1)='4',town_out,''))) as textOut2
		,if(substring(a.test,3,1)='3',street_out
									 ,if(substring(a.test,3,1)='4',town_out,'')) as textOut3
		,if(substring(a.test,4,1)='4',town_out,'') as textOut4
		,a.test as available
		,concat(if(flat_out != '', concat(flat_out,', '), ''),
				if(house_out != '', concat(house_out,', '), ''),
				if(street_out != '', concat(street_out,', '), ''),
				if(town_out != '', concat(town_out,', '), ''),
				postcode_out5) as AddrConcat
from (
select
	sao as flat_out,
	pao as house_out,
	street_name as street_out,
	town_name as town_out, 
	postcode as postcode_out5,
	uprn as uprn_out,
	lng as lng_out,
	lat as lat_out,
	{Choose_Address} as uprn_selected,
	CONCAT(if(length(sao)>0,1,'')
			,if(length(pao)>0,2,'')
			,if(length(street_name)>0,3,'')
			,if(length(town_name)>0,4,'')) as test
FROM 
	llpgcache
WHERE 
	uprn = {Choose_Address}) a","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

58efbd46c0cbd.Name: LLP018 Confirm the entered address
58efbd46c0cbd.Output_template: {"systemID":"59dc224eb4f63","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"select a.*, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'Entered','') as uprn_selected, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'',1) as Address_Found, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'' ,concat(if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 < 3,'The address must contain a flat or house number, road and postcode. ','') ,if(b.p4 = 1,' The postcode must contain a space, for e.g. "PO1 2AL"',''))) as confMsg, '' as confirmAddress, b.* from( select aq.* ,if(substring(aq.test,1,1)='1',flat_out ,if(substring(aq.test,1,1)='2',house_out ,if(substring(aq.test,1,1)='3',street_out ,if(substring(aq.test,1,1)='4',town_out,'')))) as textOut1 ,if(substring(aq.test,2,1)='2',house_out ,if(substring(aq.test,2,1)='3',street_out ,if(substring(aq.test,2,1)='4',town_out,''))) as textOut2 ,if(substring(aq.test,3,1)='3',street_out ,if(substring(aq.test,3,1)='4',town_out,'')) as textOut3 ,if(substring(aq.test,4,1)='4',town_out,'') as textOut4 ,aq.test as available ,concat(if(flat_out != '', concat(flat_out,', '), ''), if(house_out != '', concat(house_out,', '), ''), if(street_out != '', concat(street_out,', '), ''), if(town_out != '', concat(town_out,', '), ''), postcode_out5, zIPPostcode, if(country_out != '', concat(', ', country_out), '')) as AddrConcat from ( select 123 as id, {flat_out1} as flat_out, {house_out1} as house_out, {street_out1} as street_out, {town_out1} as town_out, {postcode_out51} as postcode_out5, {zIPPostcode1} as zIPPostcode, {country_out1} as country_out, {sel_country} as country_id_out, '' as uprn_out, '' as lng_out, '' as lat_out, '' as existSelected, '' as existingCustomer, CONCAT(if(length({flat_out1})>0,1,'') ,if(length({house_out1})>0,2,'') ,if(length({street_out1})>0,3,'') ,if(length({town_out1})>0,4,'')) as test) aq ) as a RIGHT JOIN (select if(c.p1 + c.p2 + c.p3 - c.p4 > 2,'123','321') as id, c.* from (select if({flat_out1} != '' or {house_out1} != '',1,0) as p1, if({street_out1} != '',1,0) as p2, if({postcode_out51} != '' or {zIPPostcode1} != '',1,0) as p3, if({postcode_out51} REGEXP '(((^[BEGLMNSbeglmns][1-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww][2-9])|(^([Aa][BLbl]|[Bb][ABDHLNRSTabnhlnrst]|[Cc][ABFHMORTVWabfhmortvw]|[Dd][ADEGHLNTYadeghlnty]|[Ee][HNXhnx]|[Ff][KYky]|[Gg][LUYluy]|[Hh][ADGPRSUXadgprsux]|[Ii][GMPVgmpv]|[JEje]|[Kk][ATWYatwy]|[Ll][ADELNSUadelnsu]|[Mm][EKLekl]|[Nn][EGNPRWegnprw]|O[LXlx]|[Pp][AEHLORaehlor]|[Rr][GHMghm]|[Ss][AEGKL-Paegkl-pRSTWYrstwy]|[Tt][ADFNQRSWadfnqrsw]|[UBub]|[Ww][ADFNRSVadfnrsv]|YO|ZE|yo|ze)[0-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww]1[A-Ha-hJKSTUWjkstuw0-9])|(((^[Ww][Cc][1-2])|(^[Ee][Cc][1-4])|(^[Ss][Ww]1))[ABEHMNPRVWXYabehmnprvwxy]))[_ ]([0-9][ABD-Habd-hJLNP-Ujlnp-uW-Zw-z]{2}))$|(^[Gg][Ii][Rr][_ ]0[Aa]{2})$',0,if({postcode_out51} != '',1,0)) as p4) as c) as b ON a.id = b.id","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

props.label: html 4
props.content:
{#testFormWarn}

Purpose

To ensure that PCC tenancies are correctly recorded as either General Needs or Sheltered Housing Units.

Status changes occur either at the start of a tenancy or during the duration of a tenancy ( ie from general needs to category 1 or vica versa)

Start of a tenancy - the responsibility is with the housing officer.

During the tenancy -the responsibility is with the Sheltered Housing Management team.

Sheltered Housing accommodation will have:

  • an appropriate category recorded on Northgate
    • Shelt CAT 0.5 = Future lettings recorded as general needs
    • Shelt Cat 0 = Future lettings recorded as Sheltered
  • additional charges ie sheltered housing service charge and supporting people charge
  • an alarm unit within the flat linked into the scheme and/or Southampton telecare
  • records held on the telecare system shared with Southampton
  • the support of a scheme manager
  • These changes relate to Category 1 Sheltered Housing. So Category 2 and Category 2.5 properties always remain as Sheltered Units

props.label: Sheltcat type?
html 2
props.content:
Action to take

SAC

Please enable the alarm system if it is NOT a standalone system.

Telecare

Please update Jontek to make the record ACTIVE. If no details from the Scheme Manager, request the relevant information.

Debit Control

In Northgate, please insert elements SPCHARGE and SERVCHARGE. If currently no SHELTCAT, change to SHELTCAT 0.5. If current SHELTCAT 0, change to SHELTCAT 1 via Bulk Elem from the enable date using the correct codes for the property type.

NTOs

If Scheme Manager is not already aware, please notify them.
